column4: hey guys, for some reason I get firefox 1.5 as the latest version in Synaptic, how do I get it to show the latest version 9which I know to be 2. whatever) ??
first day running linux
hey guys, for some reason I get firefox 1.5 as the latest version in Synaptic, how do I get it to show the latest version 9which I know to be 2. whatever) ?
firefox 1.5 is the latest current on ubuntu 6.0.6
not from the ubuntu repo's
follow that link, don't worry about re-compiling kernels etc etc
i have nvidia drivers installed
whats the problem ?
sorry I must have missed the link, it took me to an nvidia question
you'll get better help on the ubuntu forums, as thats ubuntu focused rather than generic linux distros
then post a question on the forum
well you should get both from the ubuntu repo's so - it shouldn't be a problem
why do you want to
use the versions from the ubuntu repo's and you'll know they match
the ubuntu teams make sure the package versions are compatible, just trust them
did you attempt to get any packages from anywhere other than the ubuntu repo's
then you're screwed
you'd installed broke ndiswapper softare
you didn't install as a package so you can't remove easy so you'll have to re-install
then next time follow information from ubuntu sources
rather then random website
